textos_fuente.text: Bardmoor Golf & Tennis Club ⛳️ Book Golf Online • golfscape™ Explore Destinations Help Log In Sign Up Language Currency How can we help? How can I book a tee time? 1 Navigate to your preferred golf course. Select your date of play, tee time, rentals, and number of players – and then click Book. You will receive an instant email confirmation and your tee time will be guaranteed at the course. Can I modify or cancel a booking? 1 Absolutely! If you are within the cancellation policy of your tee time, navigate to the Manage Booking page to modify or cancel your booking. What is your cancellation policy? 1 You can typically cancel your booking for a full refund within 48 hours of your tee time, but this may vary slightly by course. Cancellation policies are defined by each golf course and are clearly marked during the entire booking process as well as in your email confirmation. Why should I book with golfscape? 1 We are the only service who’s technology operates at all our partner courses – that means tee times and rates on golfscape are sourced directly. So when you make a booking, your reservation is confirmed instantly at the golf course. How can I get more help? 1 You may communicate with us anytime using the button below or email us at [email protected] – we’re happy to help! Contact us Get Started Create Account or sign up with Log In Forgot Password? Log In or log in with Profile My Bookings Log Out Tampa Golf Courses Bardmoor Golf & Tennis Club Bardmoor Golf & Tennis Club Tampa Golf Courses Next Previous Show all photos Instant Booking Confirmation Trusted by 1M+ Golfers Free Changes & Cancellations Florida golf doesn't get any better than Bardmoor. Broad, generous fairways that invite you to hit away, glistening water features that add some sparkle to your round and of course, abundant sunshine. Arnold Palmer, Payne Stewart, Fred Couples, and Tom Kite to name a few have all played here. These PGA Tour players competed here annually in the PGA read more Course Details 18 Holes Par 72 7015 yards Established in 1974 Unique Course Type Bent Grass Designed by William Diddel Club Facilities 62.check Caddy / Golf Carts 62.check Practice Facilities 62.check Lessons 62.check Dining 62.check Club / Shoe Rental 62.check Golf Shop Weather Today's condition: - Temperature: / • Sunrise: / • Sunset: / ℃ ℉ back to Bardmoor Golf & Tennis Club Map Location 8001 Cumberland Road Seminole, Florida United States View map We are getting you the best tee time rates at this course Book a Tee Time Select Date of Play Tee Times & Players Instant Booking Confirmation Trusted by 1M+ Golfers Free Changes & Cancellations Instant Booking Confirmation Trusted by 1M+ Golfers Free Changes & Cancellations Book a Tee Time More Golf Courses in Tampa View all Tampa Golf Courses 8.5 472 reviews Cove Cay Golf Club Manage Booking Blog: Futuri Visio Golf Course Operators Terms of Use Affiliate Partnerships Privacy Policy Contact Us © 2025 golfscape . Special Events & Meetings - Bardmoor Golf and Tennis Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Pinterest Twitter Book a Tee Time Bardmoor Golf and Tennis Club Home Golf Book a Tee Time Course Overview Scorecard Practice Facilities PGA Instruction Golf Shop at Bardmoor Current Golf Rates Outings Tournaments & Outings Golf Leagues Request Outing Information Dining & Events Pizzeria & Grille at Bardmoor Special Events & Meetings Weddings & Bridal Events Request Special Event Information Tennis & Pickleball New Pickleball Center Tennis at Bardmoor Tennis Programs & Instruction Memberships Player Development Program Tennis & Pickleball Memberships Member Statements Contact Directions & Hours Contact Us Special Events & Meetings A Great Clubhouse and Scenic Course Views Provide the Perfect Backdrop for Your Event “I want to take this opportunity to personally thank the staff at Bardmoor. From the front of the house to the back, your staff made our group feel extremely comfortable. The room set up was great and the food was delicious. And let’s not forget the Service Flags – that was a great touch. Looks to me we have found a new location!” – Larry Tucker, VA Luncheon Committee Member From intimate cocktail parties to corporate meetings to community events and receptions, we have the perfect location. So think of Bardmoor Golf & Tennis Club next time you are looking for a place to hold your event. We offer beautiful surroundings and a newly renovated venue featuring a stylish ballroom and an inviting outdoor patio which can accommodate events for approximately 200 guests. A highly skilled staff will assist with all the arrangements for your group. Our first-class amenities along with our professional staff will ensure that your special occasion is sure to be a memorable and successful event. Bardmoor offers affordable event packages and personalized menus for any size budget. From continental breakfasts, brunch or lunch buffets to all occasion cocktail hours to formal sit-down dinners. Menus range from delicatessen style buffets to hearty barbecues and carving stations to the best prime rib, seafood and more. For More Information or to Schedule a Tour, Please Contact: Janina Krawcyzk, Catering Director (727) 399-1000 ext 361 Catering33777@BayouClubGolf.com Click Here to Request More Information about Special Events at Bardmoor Photos courtesy of Brian C Idocks Photographics Visit BrianCIdocks.com Book Your Tee Time Online For tee times over the phone, please call For tee times please call: (727) 392-1234 . Whether you are planning a bridal shower for 30 or your wedding for 150 guests, our professional staff will assist you with every detail to make it memorable. Surrounded by lush fairways and scenic golf course views, Bardmoor features an outdoor ceremony site and our newly renovated venue featuring a stylish ballroom and an inviting outdoor patio which can accommodate approximately 200 guests. Bardmoor’s professional staff is experienced in hosting a wide range of bridal events including: Bridal Showers Bridal Luncheons Bachelor Golf Outings Rehearsal Dinners Wedding Ceremonies & Receptions Anniversary Celebrations Let us create the perfect blend of sophistication, elegance and warmth to match your personality and style.
